question: As a Cloud Solutions Architect with expertise in cloud architecture, DevOps, and infrastructure security, how interested are you in developing skills in Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) to further strengthen the security and compliance of our cloud environments?
options: Not interested; I prefer to focus on my current areas of expertise.
Slightly interested; I might consider it if there's a clear practical application.
Moderately interested; I am open to training and exploring CSPM tools on a case-by-case basis.
Very interested; I would actively pursue learning opportunities and certifications in CSPM to enhance our cloud security posture.
